name: RenoirSt
tagline: A DSL enabling programmatic cascading style sheet generation for Pharo Smalltalk
body:
### Intro
This MIT licensed library is aimed to provide a DSL to easily support CSS generation for [Pharo](www.pharo-project.org).

Checkout the installation instructions in the [GitHub project](https://github.com/gcotelli/RenoirSt) or the [online-tutorial](https://github.com/gcotelli/RenoirSt/blob/stable/docs/tutorial/Tutorial%20-%20TOC.md)

### Goals
- Improve CSS integration with existing Web Frameworks
- Write & refactor in Smalltalk, deploy to CSS

### Features
- Common properties declaration
- CSS3 Selectors Support 
- Important Rules
- Media Queries Support

### Authors 
2014, Gabriel Omar Cotelli (@gcotelli)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
